name: EAWiFiUnconfiguredAccessoryBrowser
desc: An object you use to scan for wireless accessories and configure them for use with the user's app.

items.name: init(delegate: EAWiFiUnconfiguredAccessoryBrowserDelegate?, queue: DispatchQueue?)
items.desc: Creates a browser object that scans for unconfigured accessories.

items.name: var delegate: EAWiFiUnconfiguredAccessoryBrowserDelegate?
items.desc: The object that acts as the delegate of the browser and receives browser events.

items.name: protocol EAWiFiUnconfiguredAccessoryBrowserDelegate
items.desc: A protocol you use to manage the search and configuration processes for an unconfigured accessory browser.

items.name: func configureAccessory(EAWiFiUnconfiguredAccessory, withConfigurationUIOn: UIViewController)
items.desc: Begins the configuration process for the specified accessory.

items.name: func startSearchingForUnconfiguredAccessories(matching: NSPredicate?)
items.desc: Starts the search for unconfigured accessories that match the specified predicate.

items.name: func stopSearchingForUnconfiguredAccessories()
items.desc: Stops the search for unconfigured accessories.

items.name: var unconfiguredAccessories: Set<EAWiFiUnconfiguredAccessory>
items.desc: The set of unconfigured accessories that have been discovered.
